name: Safe Haven
description: Urgent move and infrastructure including fencing, kennels, kitchen, office and movement of the dogs
theme: Every hero needs a home building the foundation to move our dogs out of the current temporary shelter.

name: Heart & Healing Center
description: Main building for Clinic, Grooming, Adoption Area, Caretaker Apartment, Visitor Areas
theme: The beating heart of compassion and healing for every Superdog. This is the main building of the Sanctuary where our dogs are cared for and meet adopters.

name: Playground of Joy
description: Include a fenced in playground for training/walks and even a swim.
theme: A space where our rescued dogs rediscover happiness.

name: Garden of Love & Legacy
description: Includes our renovated Adobe House/Chapel & Memorial Garden for the ashes of departed pets. A Community room for group education, merchandising, pet supplies
theme: Honoring those pets who have passed over the rainbow bridge and teaching compassion.

name: Sanctuary Experience
description: Consists of Glamping and Hiking area/2 domes, each accommodating 4 persons.
theme: Where visitors live, dream, rest and reflect and can connect with our dogs.
